alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 7:54AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low water crossings may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 753 AM MST, Gauge reports around the San Carlos area indicates high flows on rivers and tributaries. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Carlos and Peridot. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
